locale.message: This plugin permits the integration of FidusWriter as a content editor for submission documents.
Use the following form to configure your OJS installation with the details of a FidusWriter installation to which OJS can delegate document creation and editing processes.
The API URL is the base URL that OJS will use to interact with FidusWriter.
You must enter a valid API URL.
You must enter a valid API key.
The specified API URL and key could not be validated. Please double-check both values.

You are about to be redirected to FidusWriter, an external tool that can be used to compose and edit scholarly content. Please note that although FidusWriter has the ability to save your document back to this journal, it may be hosted on a different server. When you are finished, you will be directed back here to continue the submission process.
